trustfund:
TF029906-BNPP-POVERTY: MAINSTREAMING
            POVERTY IMPACT EVALUATION IN THE REGIONS,TF050438-NTF:ESSD-PSIA(POVERTY AND
            SOCIAL IMPACT ANALYSIS), CHAD

abstracts.cdata!:
Project ratings are as follows: Project
            outcome is satisfactory, sustainability is likely,
            institutional development is substantial, Bank performance
            is satisfactory, and Borrower performance is satisfactory.
            Three key lessons can be drawn, centering on 1) the
            importance of borrower empowerment, leadership, effective
            coordinating role and strong commitment to the Reform; 2)
            the importance of providing support through parallel
            capacity building operations in a context of weak
            capacities; and 3) the adequacy of the Structural Adjustment
            Credit instrument.
